Cambisols = Soils that show "signs of beginning soil formation", i.e. that are only moderately developed on account of their limited pedogenetic age or because of rejuvenation of the soil material. Moderately developed soils occur in all environments, from sea level to the highlands, from the equator to the boreal regions, and under all kinds of vegetation. Other diagnostic horizons might occur but have not been recorded.
